q_en: Which customer orders are the cutting tasks that the Advanced Cutting Group has not yet completed?

steps.sql: SELECT DISTINCT o.id, o.order_name FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id JOIN orders o ON op.order_id = o.id JOIN customers c ON o.user_id = c.id WHERE wg.name = 'Advanced Cutters' AND ct.status != 2;
steps.description: To find the customer orders associated with cutting tasks that the working group named 'Advanced Cutters' have not yet completed, we need to join the cutting_tasks table with the working_group, orders, and customers tables. We will filter the results to include only those tasks that are not completed (status != 2) and are associated with the specified working group.

response: It looks like the "Advanced Cutters" team is on top of their game! ğŸ‰ There are currently no customer orders with cutting tasks that they haven't completed. Keep up the great work! ğŸ˜„
